title: Login page not loading
description: User reports blank screen while accessing login page.

title: Payment failed
description: Payment gateway fails after submitting card details.

title: Email verification not received
description: Customer did not receive verification email after signup.

title: Dashboard loading slowly
description: Dashboard takes too long to load after login.

title: Password reset link expired
description: Reset password link expires immediately after request.

title: Unable to download invoice
description: Invoice download button does not respond.

title: Search feature not working
description: Search returns no results even for valid keywords.

title: Notification not showing
description: User does not receive in-app notifications.

title: Mobile layout broken
description: UI breaks on small screen devices.

title: Session expired too quickly
description: User session logs out within a few minutes.

title: Language not switching
description: Language change option does not update content.

title: File upload failed
description: User cannot upload documents to the system.

title: Settings page crashing
description: Settings page crashes when opening notification settings.
